telcoslog: La experiencia en telecomunicaciones se une a la innovación en SaaS.
indexMax: Maximice los ingresos, optimice los procesos y reduzca los costes con nuestras soluciones
indexBPOText: Nuestros servicios BPO incluyen asistencia de nivel 1 y 2, ventas (salientes y entrantes) y cobros. Agilice sus operaciones comerciales y mejore la satisfacción del cliente.
indexManagedText: Con años de experiencia hemos aprendido qué anuncios dan resultados positivos y cuáles no. Proporcionamos el ROAS más alto para sus campañas publicitarias.
indexSalesText: Desde Impulse leads, una innovadora plataforma de generación de leads para CSP, hasta Telemetrics, una solución innovadora para descubrir oportunidades de venta cruzada y de upselling. Estamos obsesionados con que usted sea más rentable.
indexSolveProblemsTitle-1: You are not upselling or cross selling to your existing user base
indexSolveProblemsText-1: You are not sending emails or SMS messages to encourage customers to upgrade their packages when their circuit usage surges, and you are also not analyzing customer behavior.
indexSolveProblemsTitle-2: Your Ads are not converting as they used to
indexSolveProblemsText-2: Because all ISPs are putting more ad dollars into the mix, it's become a tougher playing field, and your ads aren't converting as they used to. We craft ads to differentiate you from your competition and implement killer ad strategies.
indexSolveProblemsTitle-3: Considering outsourcing but have not pulled the trigger
indexSolveProblemsText-3: The big players? They've been into outsourcing for over a decade, and they keep on growing. With our BPO solutions, we can step up your operational game and slash costs by more than 40%
indexOurSolutionsDescription-1: Empower your B2B endeavors with the crucial data and software to effortlessly connect and seal deals with your most valuable buyers, all conveniently integrated in one piace.
indexOurSolutionsDescription-2: Boost residential and corporate upsell and cross-sale opportunities by up to 200% with the help of AI and ML.
indexOurSolutionsDescription-3: Improve Customer Satisfaction, Boost Sales, and Minimize Churn with Impulse Bot—an innovative AI and ML-powered chatbot designed to assist your customers round the clock.
indexOurSolutionsDescription-4: We create websites and develop mobile applications to support the growth of telecoms and communication service providers.
indexOurSolutionsDescription-5: Streamline your billing processes, enhance customer satisfaction, and simplify payments with Impulse Pays user-friendly portal.
indexOurSolutionsDescription-6: Our BPO services include sales, support, and outbound services to streamline your business operations and enhance customer satisfaction.
indexOurIntegrationPartnersDescription: We aim to assist our clients in increasing their revenue, minimizing expenses,and optimizing their processes through our solutions via automation and analytics.
